This script analyzes temperature measurements during resazurin assays.     

# Set up 

Set up workspace, set options, and load required packages.    
```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```

Load libraries. 
```{r}
library(MASS) 
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(cowplot)
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
library(car)
library(effects)
library(emmeans)
library(tools)
```

# Load and plot data 

```{r}
temps<-read_excel(path="taylor-shellfish-sept2025/data/temperature/temperature.xlsx")%>%mutate(date=as.character(date))

temp_plot<-temps%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=timepoint, y=temperature))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(aes(group=1), colour="black")+
  theme_classic()+
  ylab("Water Temperature (Â°C)")+
  xlab("Time Point");temp_plot

ggsave(temp_plot, filename="taylor-shellfish-sept2025/figures/temperature_plot_wells.png", width=4, height=4)
```

Calculate averages

```{r}
temps%>%
  group_by(timepoint)%>%
  summarise(mean=mean(temperature), se=sd(temperature)/sqrt(length(temperature)))
```
